Home » 2V Pācittiyapāḷi » 2 Bhikkhunivibhaṅga » 2.3 Nissaggiyakaṇḍa » 2.3.3 (Dutiya) Pattavagga
2.3.3.10 Pariṇatasikkhāpada
Bhikkhunivibhaṅga
Nissaggiyakaṇḍa
(Dutiya) Pattavagga
Pariṇatasikkhāpada
2563Uddiṭṭhā kho, ayyāyo, tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammā. Tatthāyyāyo pucchāmi—  “kaccittha parisuddhā”? Dutiyampi pucchāmi—  “kaccittha parisuddhā”? Tatiyampi pucchāmi—  “kaccittha parisuddhā”? Parisuddhetthāyyāyo, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmīti.
2564Bhikkhunivibhaṅge nissaggiyakaṇḍaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< 2.3.3.9 Accekacīvarasikkhāpadaup2.4 Pācittiyakaṇḍa >>
